alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:18PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pima County through 745 PM MST... At 718 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Arivaca, or 30 miles west of Tubac, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newfield and Sasabe. This includes Route 286 between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales
